cases.description: Normal ABG - all values in normal range
cases.source: pH 7.40 (normal), PCO2 40 (normal), HCO3 24 (normal). Na 140, Cl 103, Alb 4.0. AG=140-(103+24)=13. CorrAG=13+2.5*(4-4)=13. AG<=12? No, 13>12→High AG(13.0). Delta=13-12=1. Delta-delta=1+24=25 (22-28→no mixed). Delta ratio=1/(24-24) → denominator=0, no ratio calc.
pH 7.30 (<7.35→acidosis), PCO2 55 (>45→respiratory). Na 140, Cl 102, Alb 4.0. AG=140-(102+28)=10. CorrAG=10. AG<=12→Normal AG.

cases.description: Metabolic Acidosis with high AG - DKA
cases.source: pH 7.20 (<7.35→acidosis), PCO2 28 (<=45), HCO3 10 (<22→metabolic). Na 138, Cl 100, Alb 4.0. AG=138-(100+10)=28. CorrAG=28. HighAG(28.0). Delta=28-12=16. Delta-delta=16+10=26 (22-28→no mixed). DeltaRatio=16/(24-10)=16/14=1.14→Pure high AG.
pH 7.50 (>7.45→alkalosis), PCO2 28 (<35→respiratory). Na 140, Cl 108, Alb 4.0. AG=140-(108+22)=10. CorrAG=10. NormalAG.

cases.description: Compensated state with hypoalbuminemia - corrected AG
cases.source: pH 7.38 (7.35-7.45→normal), PCO2 48 (>45), HCO3 27 (>26)→Compensated Resp Acidosis/Metabolic Alkalosis. Na 140, Cl 100, Alb 2.0. AG=140-(100+27)=13. CorrAG=13+2.5*(4-2)=18. HighAG(18.0). Delta=18-12=6. Delta-delta=6+27=33 (>28→+Metabolic Alkalosis).
